snippet: "The Book of Mormon" and "Newsies" set house records, while "The Lion King" becomes the highest grossing show of all time.
abstract: "The Book of Mormon" and "Newsies" set house records, while "The Lion King" becomes the highest grossing show of all time.

headline.main: Spring Vacation Means Hit Broadway Shows Reap the Benefits of Higher Ticket Prices
headline.print_headline: Musicals, and Prices, Are Big With Tourists
